name: Shehata Antonious
degree: Master in Computer Science, GISMA University - Germany
degree_other: Master Business Administration (MBA), ESLSCA Business School - France
about_text: Senior Software Engineer with 10+ years in .NET (C#, ASP.NET Core), React, Docker and SQL Server, delivering scalable cloud platforms for 4,000+ users. Specialized in microservices, REST APIs, and Azure services; German B1, visa-ready, seeking .NET focused roles.

skills.title: Skills & Technologies
skills.frontend: Frontend Skills: HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript(ES6+), ReactJS, Responsive Design (Bootstrap, Tailwind CSS), REST API Integration, Cross-Browser Compatibility
skills.backend: Backend Skills: C#, .NET (ASP.NET Core, MVC), REST API Development, Microservices Architecture, Authentication: JWT, OAuth2
skills.databases: Database: SQL: MS SQL Server, MySQL, NoSQL: MongoDB, Database Design & Querying
skills.devops: DevOps & Cloud: CI/CD: GitHub Actions, GitLab CI, Containerization: Docker, Cloud Platforms: Microsoft Azure (App Services, Blob Storage), Event-driven: Kafka
skills.version_control: Version Control & Project Management: Git (GitHub, GitLab), Agile / Scrum
skills.testing: Testing: Unit Testing: NUnit, xUnit, Integration Testing
skills.machine_learning: Machine Learning & Data Science: Python (NumPy, Pandas, Matplotlib), Scikit-learn, Model training, evaluation, Jupyter Notebooks
skills.soft_skills: Soft Skills: Strong Communication & Team Collaboration, Problem Solving & Critical Thinking, Fast Learner, High Ownership, Self-Driven

parliament.title: Senior Software Engineer – Information Technology Center – Head Office (2018 – 2023)

integrated_erp.title: Integrated ERP Modules (2021-2023)
integrated_erp.details:
• Designed a unified platform used by 4,000+ staff in procurement, logistics and finance
• Consolidated four legacy systems into a centralized solution with consistent data and modular architecture
• Standardized over 5,000 item records, reducing data duplication and manual correction by 65%
• Enhanced settlement workflows for pharmacy and staff funds in coordination with over 50 vendors
• Created executive dashboards to visualize 5-year historical data and financial forecasts
Tech Stack: ASP.NET MVC (5), C#, SQL Server 2017, REST APIs, Power BI, Crystal Reports, Git

session_management.title: Parliamentary Session & Voting Management System (2019-2021)
session_management.details:
• Maintained and optimized mission-critical systems serving 1,200 Members of Parliament
• Connected encrypted voting records to MP profiles to ensure traceability and compliance
• Solved key synchronization issues and enabled real-time dashboards for session attendance and voting
• Automated upload and indexing for session recordings every 15 minutes with searchable playback
• Built a tool that reduced transcript preparation from 3 weeks to under an hour
Tech Stack: ASP.NET MVC, JavaScript (ES6), SQL Server, Azure Blob Storage, Kafka, jQuery, SignalR

erequest_platform.title: E-Request Platform for Parliamentary Members (2018-2019)
erequest_platform.details:
• Built a secure internal request system used by 1,200 MPs to interact with ministries
• Implemented full role-based access control with detailed activity logging
• Cut request turnaround time by 45% via automated workflows and notifications
• Improved adoption and platform engagement by 90% after redesign and performance tuning
Tech Stack: ASP.NET MVC, C#, SQL Server, Bootstrap 4, Microservices (modular services via HTTP APIs)

mid_level.title: Mid-Level Software Engineer – Information Systems Development Department (2015 – 2018)

digital_archiving.title: Digital Document Archiving (2016–2018)
digital_archiving.details:
• Implemented a centralized archiving system managing 100,000+ scanned files
• Enabled rapid document retrieval, reducing time from hours to seconds
• Reduced physical document usage by 95% through complete digitization
Tech Stack: C#, ASP.NET Web Forms, SQL Server 2014, Containerization: Docker, Windows Services

mp_onboarding.title: MP Onboarding & Attendance Tracking System (2015–2016)
mp_onboarding.details:
• Developed an internal tool for MP onboarding and attendance tracking for all MPs
• Integrated attendance logs, role assignments, and calendar session mapping
• Cut onboarding time by 70% and increased the data accuracy by 90%+
Tech Stack: ASP.NET Web API 2, C#, React.js, SQL Server, Containerization: Docker, jQuery, Entity Framework 6

biometric_system.title: HR & Biometric Attendance System (2015–2016)
biometric_system.details:
• Delivered an HR and payroll-linked biometric attendance system for 4,000+ employees
• Integrated with fingerprint devices and connected to leave management and payroll systems
• Reduced attendance manipulation and raise accuracy by 90%+
Tech Stack: ASP.NET MVC 5, C#, SQL Server, Windows Services, Entity Framework, Biometric SDKs

junior.title: Junior Software Engineer – Project Management Department (2013 – 2015)

parliament_website.title: Parliament Official Web Portal (2014–2015)
parliament_website.details:
• Supported development and maintenance of the parliament's public-facing website
• Focused on uptime, SEO optimization, and responsive design
• Handled heavy traffic peaks during major sessions (50,000+ users/day)
Tech Stack: ASP.NET Web Forms, C#, JavaScript (ES5), SQL Server 2012, HTML5/CSS3, jQuery

legacy_migration.title: Legacy Database Migration Project (2013–2014)
legacy_migration.details:
• Migrated over 1 million records from IBM DB2-based legacy system to modern SQL Server infrastructure
• Created data mapping scripts and ran integrity validation during and post-migration
• Achieved zero downtime and 100% data integrity
Tech Stack: IBM DB2, SQL Server 2012, SQL Scripts, Data Migration Assistant
